main event: A bright ball of white and flaming trail was observed by a weather observer at Wheelus AB, Tripoli, Libya on December 2, 1960.
interesting points: The object had a tapering tail that was 3 times the diameter of the ball.
The color of the object ranged from orange-yellow to a lighter shade of orange and yellow.
The sighting lasted for approximately 30 seconds before the object disappeared suddenly.
The object was observed at an azimuth of 25-30 degrees and an elevation of 15 degrees.
The weather conditions were clear with a visibility of 15 miles, temperature of 23Â°F, and wind speed of 5 knots.
sighted object: a bright ball of white with a flaming trail
